includedAssets.title: Transformers
includedAssets.synopsis: Highly sophisticated robots from a faraway world land on Earth to continue a war that's already decimated their home planet. The 'Autobots' protect human life, yet the 'Decepticons' will stop at nothing to reach their goal - will a pair of high school kids and some military bods stop the carnage, or get caught in between? Director Michael Bay puts pedal to metal in an effects-led extravaganza that dazzles, deafens, stuns and staggers... all at the same time.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Robotic carnage as the heroic Autobots take on the evil Decepticons. Will mankind survive? Adrenaline-charged action from director Michael Bay.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Highly sophisticated robots from a faraway world land on Earth to continue a war that's already decimated their home planet. The 'Autobots' protect human life, yet the 'Decepticons' will stop at nothing to reach their goal - will a pair of high school kids and some military bods stop the carnage, or get caught in between? Director Michael Bay puts pedal to metal in an effects-led extravaganza that dazzles, deafens, stuns and staggers... all at the same time.

includedAssets.title: Transformers: Revenge Of The Fallen
includedAssets.synopsis: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem.

includedAssets.title: Transformers: Dark Of The Moon
includedAssets.synopsis: More morphing motors in the third instalment of the explosive franchise. Can Shia LaBeouf once again save the world from the Decepticons?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: More morphing motors in the third instalment of the explosive franchise. Can Shia LaBeouf once again save the world from the Decepticons?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: More morphing motors in the third instalment of the explosive franchise. Can Shia LaBeouf once again save the world from the Decepticons?

includedAssets.title: Transformers: Age Of Extinction
includedAssets.synopsis: Single dad Mark Wahlberg gets caught up with the Autobots as they battle a shady government plot. Explosive action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Single dad Mark Wahlberg gets caught up with the Autobots as they battle a shady government plot. Explosive action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Single dad Mark Wahlberg gets caught up with the Autobots as they battle a shady government plot. Explosive action.

includedAssets.title: Transformers
includedAssets.synopsis: Optimus Prime leads his army of sentient robots, the Autobots, against their ancient enemies, the Decepticons, with Earth caught in the middle. Box office smash starring Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Mark Wahlberg and directed by Michael Bay.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two groups of sentient robots go to war, with Earth caught in the middle. Box office smash with Shia LaBeouf and Mark Wahlberg. Michael Bay directs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Optimus Prime leads his army of sentient robots, the Autobots, against their ancient enemies, the Decepticons, with Earth caught in the middle. Box office smash starring Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Mark Wahlberg and directed by Michael Bay.

includedIn.title: Transformers
includedIn.synopsis: Earth is caught in the crossfire when two ancient races of sentient robots, the Autobots and Decepticons, wage a destructive war against each other.
